description: Try our easy to follow Frozen Summer Fruit Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit salad,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,High fibre,Mandarin,Dairy free,Pescatarian,Low salt,Blueberry,Egg free,Grape,Strawberry,Halal,Vegetarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegan,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Frozen Summer Fruit Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine fruit in a large bowl. Spoon fruit into 1-cup freezer-safe containers with sealable lids. Cover with juice and freeze overnight until firm. Tip 1: When adding to lunch boxes, place fruit cups into a snap-lock bag so other items in the box donâ€™t get wet. The fruit will thaw before recess or lunchtime, but still be cold and slushy. Tip 2: A layer of yoghurt can be added to the base of the container before filling with fruit and juice, or set the fruit in jelly for a special treat.
